entries.bantha_doll: A small doll of a Bantha, made by patched up pieces of cloth. It's a bit dirty with small dots on it, like someone cried while hugging it.
entries.bren_kingal_q4_reward: The recipe for this delicious dessert is a closely guarded Kingal family secret.
entries.bren_kingal_q2_needed: Kli Sithrin's medpack bears an Empire logo.
entries.bren_kingal_q1_needed: Thark the Aqualish's personal shield generator apparently comes from the Imperial Army. Someone has scratched through the Empire logo.
entries.rakir_banai_q4_needed: Employment contract between Rakir Banai and Drik Bandrik in Wayfar, Tatooine.
entries.rakir_banai_q2_needed: Evidence of Drik Bandrik's slave operation in a Wayfar mine on Tatooine.
entries.sango_rond_q1_needed: Droid verbobrain stolen from trader Sango Rond at the Jawa Mountain Fortress on Tatooine.
entries.aaph_koden_q1_needed: Message from the Alliance for Talia Reede
entries.vardias_tyne_q2_needed: A small statue of a bantha
entries.windom_starkiller_q2_needed: Blix Lanister's blaster, used to murder Alita Sweetwater in Anchorhead on Tatooine.
entries.fixer_q3_needed: A small part for a speeder.
entries.kaeline_ungasan_q2_needed: A list of criminal enforcers working for Jabba the Hutt.
entries.kaeline_ungasan_q1_needed: A datadisc with Kaeline Ungasan's proposal to ally with Lady Valarian.
entries.mat_rags_q4_needed: Hide of a dead grizzled dewback from Tatooine.
entries.mat_rags_q3_needed: The horns from a dead matriarch bantha of Tatooine.
entries.mat_rags_q2_needed: The skin from a variegated womp rat of Tatooine.
entries.kitster_banai_q5_needed: Proof exonerating Kitster Banai of Mos Espa from crimes invented by slaver Drik Bandrik.
entries.wald_q4_needed: Medical pack from Watto's Junk Shop in Mos Espa.
entries.wald_q3_needed: Unidentifiable item from Watto's Junk Shop in Mos Espa; some kind of container (a stimpack?) is barely visible inside.
entries.wald_q2_needed: Salvaged equipment from Watto's Junk Shop in Mos Espa.
entries.wald_q1_needed: Broken droid brain from Watto's Junk Shop in Mos Espa.
entries.hedon_istee_q3_needed: An ancient scroll sacred to the B'omarr Order.
entries.ikka_gesul_q2_needed: A datadisc containing an encrypted message.
entries.figrindan_q3_needed: Letter from Figrin D'an, leader of the Modal Nodes, pleading with his
entries.figrindan_q2_needed: written by Figrin D'an, leader of the Modal Nodes.
entries.figrindan_q1_needed: Notes of affection from Bith musician Figrin D'an, leader of the Modal Nodes.
entries.boshek_q3_needed: A dozen Mer-Sonn C-22 fragmentation grenades with enhanced magnetic grapples.
entries.boshek_q1_needed: Current authorization codes from Imperial Customs.
entries.kormund_thrylle_q1_needed: Message for Alliance officer Reen Loruk
entries.wilhalm_skrim_q2_needed: Sensitive information for Wilhalm Skrim, Prefect Talmont's secretary in Bestine.
entries.wilhalm_skrim_q1_needed: Documents belonging to Wilhalm Skrim, secretary to Prefect Talmont in Bestine on Tatooine.
entries.binna_jode_q4_reward: Spiced meat pastries in pounded mounder dough. A Tatooine specialty, mainly because no other world would touch it. This tray, however, tastes pretty good.
entries.binna_jode_q3_reward: Corellian ale spiked with secret Tatooine liquors. Bites like a maddened dewback.
entries.binna_jode_q2_reward: A small gourd of the Tatooine funnel flower, stuffed with ground bantha meat and lightly spiced. Delicate, delicious flavor.
entries.binna_jode_q1_reward: Unexpectedly fresh, with flaky crust and a delightful spiced sauce.
entries.binna_jode_q4_needed: May contain info about Bestine cantina owner Binna's missing husband.
entries.binna_jode_q3_needed: Shirt given by Bestine cantina owner Binna to a young mother.
entries.binna_jode_q2_needed: Bestine cantina owner Binna's gift to a wounded veteran on Tatooine.
entries.binna_jode_q1_needed: A small metal drum, crudely decorated with colorful drawings.
entries.lilas_dinhint_q4_needed: A dried chunk of bantha meat that could be centuries old.
entries.lilas_dinhint_q3_needed: A centuries-old surveyor's scanner, now a museum piece.
entries.lilas_dinhint_q2_needed: A padded chest plate allegedly worn by Melnea Arnthout, leader of the miners who settled Tatooine from the Dowager Queen colony ship
entries.lilas_dinhint_q1_needed: A threadbare and scurrier-chewed robe allegedly worn centuries ago by one of Tatooine's Sand People.
entries.bren_kingal_q3_reward: Mix 1 cup blue milk, 1 cup water, 1 pinch Tusken brew-yeast. Leave in warm place for a while. Mix 1 handful (humanoid hand) mounder flour, 3 pinches salt. Slowly add bantha butter until doughy; add brew-yeast mixture. Knead until stiff. Leave in warm place until doubled. Knead briefly, rip hand-size (humanoid hand) pieces of dough, pound flat. Fry over low heat until crisp. Eat immediately.
entries.bren_kingal_q2_reward: Cube 1 thick bantha steak; trim fat, pat dry. Saute meat in bantha butter until brown. Core, seed, and chop 2 large ootowergs, 3 ripe dropes, 1 small koba if available. Add vegetables to cooked meat, cook til heated through. Put all in pot of boiling water. Cover, simmer at low heat for 3 days. Add roosha to taste. Serves 1-2.
entries.bren_kingal_q1_reward: Salt 1 small worrt; dust with mounder flour. Saute in blue milk until brown; place in casserole dish, pour pan drippings over worrt. Add 1 handful (humanoid hand) trimpian, 1 pinch tomo spice. Fill casserole with blue milk, cover, bake at medium heat until tender. Serves 1.
entries.stella_q3_needed: Information secured by a Bothan spy for Stella, owner of the Third Sun cantina in Mos Taike on Tatooine.
entries.stella_q2_needed: Deed to the Third Sun cantina in Mos Taike on Tatooine, stolen from owner Stella.
entries.stella_q1_needed: Credits owed to Stella, Third Sun cantina owner in Mos Taike on Tatooine.
